   Krf 000
   Description "A/R CUSTOMER MASTER FILE"
   Segment FIELD   CUSNO

Key NAME   ACCESS   Order ASCENDING   Dups YES   Insert END   Modifiable YES
   Krf 001
   Description "A/R CUSTOMER MASTER FILE"
   Segment FIELD   CM_NAME

Key CITY   ACCESS   Order ASCENDING   Dups YES   Insert END   Modifiable YES
   Krf 002
   Description "A/R CUSTOMER MASTER FILE"
   Segment FIELD   CITY
   Segment FIELD   CUSNO

   Krf 003
   Description "A/R CUSTOMER MASTER FILE"
   Segment FIELD   SORTCODE
   Segment FIELD   CUSNO

   Segment FIELD   VM_NAME

Field IT_TYPE   Type ALPHA   Size 1
   Description "Item Table Code"

Field IT_ITEMNO   Type ALPHA   Size 15
   Description "Item Number"

Field IT_SEQ   Type DECIMAL   Size 5   Precision  0
   Description "Sequence Number"

Field IT_PARTKEY   Type ALPHA   Size 16   Overlay IT_TYPE:0
   Description "Item Table Code/Item Number"

Field IT_SCRKEY   Type ALPHA   Size 20   Overlay IT_ITEMNO:0
   Description "Item Number/Sequence Number"

Field IT_KEY   Type ALPHA   Size 21   Overlay IT_TYPE:0
   Description "Item Table Code/No/Sequence No"

Field IT_SUPLCD   Type ALPHA   Size 30
   Description "Supplier's code"

Field IT_DESCR   Type ALPHA   Size 30
   Description "Description"

Field IT_EDESCR   Type ALPHA   Size 30
   Description "Extra Description"

Field IT_LOC_FROM   Type ALPHA   Size 2
   Description "Item Moved FROM"

Field IT_LOC_TO   Type ALPHA   Size 2
   Description "Location Moved TO"

Field IT_NEWLOC   Type ALPHA   Size 1
   Description "'Y' if this is a new location"

Field IT_DATE   Type DATE   Size 7   Stored YYYYJJJ
   Description "Date of Transaction"

Field IT_CUSTNO   Type ALPHA   Size 6
   Description "Customer Number"

Field IT_JOBNUM   Type ALPHA   Size 8
   Description "Job Number / Order Number"

Field IT_PONUM   Type ALPHA   Size 15
   Description "Purchase Order Number"

Field RD043A_001   Type ALPHA   Size 4
   Description "[ Filler ]"

Field IT_COST   Type DECIMAL   Size 10   Precision  2
   Description "Cost Amount"

Field IT_SALE   Type DECIMAL   Size 10   Precision  2
   Description "Sale Amount"

Field IT_NEWU   Type DECIMAL   Size 10   Precision  2   Overlay IT_SALE:0
   Description "New unit cost for type 'A'"

Field IT_UCOST   Type DECIMAL   Size 10   Precision  3
   Description "Unit Cost Amount"

Field IT_USALE   Type DECIMAL   Size 10   Precision  3
   Description "Unit Sale Amount"

Field IT_QTY   Type DECIMAL   Size 9   Precision  3
   Description "Qty Moved"

Field IT_REF   Type ALPHA   Size 10
   Description "Reference Description"

Field IT_COMMENT   Type ALPHA   Size 30
   Description "Comment"

Field IT_STKGRP   Type ALPHA   Size 6
   Description "Inventory stock group"

Field IT_TAXAMT   Type DECIMAL   Size 8   Precision  2
   Description "Tax amount"

Field IT_TAXCD   Type ALPHA   Size 1
   Description "Tax Code"

Field IT_TAXTP   Type ALPHA   Size 1
   Description "Tax type"

Field RD043A_002   Type ALPHA   Size 2
   Description "[ Filler ]"

Field IT_SLSMAN   Type DECIMAL   Size 2   Precision  0
   Description "Salesman number"

Field IT_BATCH   Type ALPHA   Size 3
   Description "Batch number"

Field IT_OLDONH   Type DECIMAL   Size 9   Precision  3
   Description "Old On Hand Qty"

Field IT_OLDAVG   Type DECIMAL   Size 10   Precision  4
   Description "Old Avg Cost"

Field IT_AVGCOST   Type DECIMAL   Size 10   Precision  4
   Description "Average cost"

Field IT_BOSEQ   Type DECIMAL   Size 3   Precision  0
   Description "Back Order Sequence"

Field IT_ABOSEQ   Type ALPHA   Size 3   Overlay IT_BOSEQ:0
   Description "Back Order Sequence (Alpha)  O"

Field IT_VENDOR   Type ALPHA   Size 8
   Description "Vendor code"

Field IT_BIN   Type ALPHA   Size 10
   Description "Bin Number"

Field IT_BCHNO   Type ALPHA   Size 6
   Description "Batch No for Bin"

Field IT_FILE_NAME   Type ALPHA   Size 23
   Description "Temp file name batch/bin alloc"

Field IT_DRACC   Type ALPHA   Size 15
   Description "Debit Account"

Field IT_CRACC   Type ALPHA   Size 15
   Description "Credit Account"

Field IT_FL_PAK   Type ALPHA   Size 1
   Description "IF 'Y' IT_BOSEQ IS PACKED"

Field IT_SERIAL   Type ALPHA   Size 15
   Description "Serial Number"

Field IT_BATCHID   Type ALPHA   Size 15
   Description "Batch ID"

Field IT_SRCREF   Type ALPHA   Size 3
   Description "Source Reference"

Field IT_SQTY   Type DECIMAL   Size 11   Precision  0
   Description "Stocktake Quantity"

Field IT_FILE_NAME2   Type ALPHA   Size 23
   Description "second Temp file name batch/bi"

Field IT_BIN2   Type ALPHA   Size 10
   Description "Seconday Bin Number Used for T"

Field RD043A_003   Type ALPHA   Size 45
   Description "[ FILLER ]"

Key PRIMARY   ACCESS   Order ASCENDING   Dups NO   Modifiable NO
   Krf 000
   Description "INVENTORY TRANSACTIONS FILE"
   Segment FIELD   IT_KEY

Key SUPLCD   ACCESS   Order ASCENDING   Dups YES   Insert END   Modifiable YES
   Krf 001
   Description "INVENTORY TRANSACTIONS FILE"
   Segment FIELD   IT_TYPE
   Segment FIELD   IT_SUPLCD

Key DESCR   ACCESS   Order ASCENDING   Dups YES   Insert END   Modifiable YES
   Krf 002
   Description "INVENTORY TRANSACTIONS FILE"
   Segment FIELD   IT_TYPE
   Segment FIELD   IT_DESCR

Key BATCHID   ACCESS   Order ASCENDING   Dups YES   Insert END   Modifiable YES
   Krf 003
   Description "INVENTORY TRANSACTIONS FILE"
   Segment FIELD   IT_BATCHID
   Segment FIELD   IT_KEY

Key IT_ITEMNO_FK FOREIGN
   Description "IT_ITEMNO (F)"
   Segment FIELD IT_ITEMNO
RELATION 1 INVTRXA                        IT_ITEMNO_FK ITMMASA                        PRIMARY

Key IT_CUSTNO_FK FOREIGN
   Description "IT_CUSTNO (F)"
   Segment FIELD IT_CUSTNO
RELATION 2 INVTRXA                        IT_CUSTNO_FK CUSMASA                        PRIMARY

Key IT_JOBNUM_FK FOREIGN
   Description "IT_JOBNUM (F)"
   Segment FIELD IT_JOBNUM
RELATION 3 INVTRXA                        IT_JOBNUM_FK JCHEADA                        JOB

Key IT_PONUM_FK FOREIGN
   Description "IT_PONUM (F)"
   Segment FIELD IT_PONUM
RELATION 4 INVTRXA                        IT_PONUM_FK POHEADA                        PRIMARY

Key IT_VENDOR_FK FOREIGN
   Description "IT_VENDOR (F)"
   Segment FIELD IT_VENDOR
RELATION 5 INVTRXA                        IT_VENDOR_FK VENMASA                        PRIMARY

Structure MSGTBLA   DBL ISAM
   Description "MESSAGE TABLE - TEMPLATE"

Tag FIELD MTA_TYPE EQ "A"

Field MTA_TYPE   Type ALPHA   Size 1
   Description " "

Field MTA_REFCODE   Type ALPHA   Size 10
   Description "Ref"

   Description "Key Segment Field"
